test_cases.input: Plan a week-long business trip to San Francisco with outdoor team activities
expectations: The workflow completes all three steps successfully
The first step provides detailed weather information for San Francisco
The second step analyzes weather conditions for outdoor activities
The third step creates a comprehensive plan using the planning tools
The workflow demonstrates excellent data flow between all steps

test_cases.input: Compare weather in London, Tokyo, and New York, then create a travel itinerary for visiting all three
expectations: The workflow retrieves weather for all three cities
The workflow provides detailed comparative analysis
The workflow creates a structured travel plan
The workflow uses planning tools effectively
The workflow shows sophisticated agent coordination

test_cases.input: Organize an outdoor wedding in Paris next month - what weather should we expect and how should we prepare?
expectations: The workflow provides comprehensive weather information for Paris
The workflow analyzes weather impact on outdoor wedding
The workflow creates detailed preparation plans
The workflow demonstrates use of multiple tools in coordination
